DOC.criteria: elective shoulder surgery Age 20 45 year old ASA I II Coagulopathy disorder Infection puncture site interscalene block Neurologic deficit arm go operate Allergy local anesthetic BMI > 35 Psychiatric disorder Patient 's refusal Problems patient communication Arrythmia Ischaemic heart disease Diabetes mellitus Thyroid function disorder Patients conduction disorder ECG Electrolyte disorder ( K+ , Na+ , Ca++ ) Patients medication affect ECG
